transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah, hello?
Speaker B: Calling from where?
Speaker A: From Absurd Students regarding the student accommodation for University College London. Oh, yes, I can see that. You're looking to book a student accommodation, correct?
Speaker B: Yes. Yeah.
Speaker A: Have you finalized with the options yet?
Speaker B: Wait, sorry, I can't hear you very well.
Speaker A: Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp? I suppose that the network line isn't very Good.
Speaker B: Connect on WhatsApp.
Speaker A: Yes, the network line isn't very good.
Speaker B: Okay, yeah, yeah, we can do WhatsApp. Call.

Speaker A: Look who is.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Yeah, hello.
Speaker B: Yeah, Vivian's dad. Actually she's also here is Rishabh.
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah. Rishabh decided we had discussed regarding the accommodations.
Speaker B: That's right. Yeah. Yeah, yeah.
Speaker A: So just wanted to confirm if you have decided any options yet.
Speaker B: Actually we went to see the. The one in Tufnell House yesterday.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: Yeah, we. I mean we. We like it. But then we're still looking for something.
Speaker A: Better which is something closer to the ucl. I guess that I have shared you some more options as well. Correct. There was one more option. You go default coin. But it's available at £430 or 20 pound.
Speaker B: Actually no, that is definitely beyond the price ransom. We are looking for any other providers who can offer us price range. Yeah, we have gone for that, whatever the 340 or something, that's fine. But we will look for something closer maybe in the similar price range. Definitely not beyond 400 or anything.
Speaker A: But in that case the toughness can be the best option because the other properties will allow. Will are closer but they do not provide an ensuite. They provide a twin sharing room sharing.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: Okay. See if you could find anything then. Yeah, you can. Yeah, text us here on that WhatsApp group. Otherwise. Yeah, we'll go for toughness if nothing else.
Speaker A: If I'll. I'll check this today and I'll give you an update whether I'll be able to find or not. If. If I. If I am able to find, I'll share it to you. If not, then we can proceed ahead with the customer. Okay, perfect.
Speaker B: Yeah, thank you.
